name: Technical Documentation
description: Comprehensive template for technical documentation and guides

sections.name: overview
sections.title: Overview
sections.prompt: Write a concise overview of {topic}, explaining what it is and its primary purpose.

sections.name: architecture
sections.title: Architecture
sections.prompt: Describe the architecture of {topic}, including key components and how they interact.

children.name: architecture_components
children.title: Key Components

children.name: architecture_diagrams

sections.name: installation
sections.title: Installation

children.name: installation_prerequisites

children.name: installation_verification

sections.name: configuration
sections.title: Configuration

children.name: configuration_files
children.title: Configuration Files

children.name: configuration_parameters

children.prompt: List and explain important configuration parameters for {topic}.

sections.name: usage
sections.title: Usage

children.name: usage_basic

children.name: usage_advanced

sections.name: troubleshooting

children.name: troubleshooting_common_issues

children.name: troubleshooting_diagnostics

sections.name: security
sections.title: Security Considerations
sections.prompt: Discuss important security considerations for {topic}. Include best practices for secure deployment and usage.

sections.name: references
sections.title: References
sections.prompt: List relevant references and additional resources for {topic}.
